text: Ra jaba manisala'i kunai kasta pugdacha taba ramro ekagra bha'era aphno palanakartala'i pukardacha ani jaba allahale usamathi aphno anukampa gardacha, taba tyasale tyasa kurala'i birsihaldacha jasako nimti pahila pukarirakheko thiyo, ra allahako samakaksi thahara'una thaldacha, taki yasako parinamasvarupa tyasale usako margabata arula'i pani vicalita gara'ide'os. Tapar'im bhanidinus ki aphno inkarako pha'ida kehi dinasam'ma li'ihala. Antatah timi narakiharumadhyeka hunechau
